name: U Thant
description: Third Secretary-General of the United Nations who led the organization through critical Cold War crises with wisdom and neutrality
philosophy: The United Nations exists not merely to preserve the peace but also to make change - even radical change - possible without violent upheaval.
quotes: Wars begin in the minds of men, and in those minds love and compassion would have built the defenses of peace
The United Nations is our one great hope for a peaceful and free world
